Classes
Class
Description
CheckerBoard
Checkerboard contains a representation of a checkerboard and pieces
CheckersComputerPlayer
CheckersComputerPlayer contains the logic of a computer player
CheckersLogic
CheckersLogic contains the logic of a checkers game
CheckersTextConsole
CheckersTextConsole contains the console based text ui
